name: Starshift
description:
This is a simple puzzle game produced for Ludum Dare 35.

Left/Right to move the shapes. Down to accelerate.

This ludum dare, I actually produced two games. I was dissatisfied with the first one, so I made a second one in Flash (this game) and submitted it.

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=p...
